title: Game Launch

notes: Implements game initialization and initial setup

title: Basic Ship Movement
notes: Implements core ship movement mechanics with inertial physics

notes: Implements forward ship movement with W key, including acceleration physics

notes: Implements backward ship movement with S key, including deceleration mechanics

notes: Implements lateral left movement with A key while maintaining ship orientation

title: Ship Strafing - Right
notes: Implements lateral right movement with D key while maintaining ship orientation

title: Speed Boost
notes: Implements temporary speed boost with Spacebar for rapid movement

notes: Implements precise aiming system using mouse control with visual targeting feedback

title: Firing Laser Weapons
notes: Implements laser weapon system with left mouse click and visual/audio feedback

title: Hitting Enemy Ships
notes: Implements collision detection and damage system for enemy ships with scoring

title: Enemy Ship Behavior
notes: Implements AI behaviors for enemy ships with distinctive movement and attack patterns

title: Asteroid Field Navigation
notes: Implements asteroid field environment with physics-based movement and collisions

title: Ship Collision with Asteroids
notes: Implements ship damage system for asteroid collisions with visual and audio feedback

title: Laser Interaction with Asteroids
notes: Implements asteroid destruction mechanics with laser weapons and scoring system

title: Health Indicator Display
notes: Implements player health UI display with real-time updates and visual feedback

title: Score Counter Display
notes: Implements score tracking UI with real-time updates and milestone notifications

title: Game Over Screen
notes: Implements game over screen with final score and restart options

title: Inertial Ship Movement
notes: Implements realistic space physics with momentum preservation and inertial movement

title: Projectile Physics
notes: Implements consistent laser projectile physics for predictable and skill-based targeting

title: Level Progression
notes: Implements difficulty progression system with new challenges at higher levels

title: Game Completion
notes: Implements game completion recognition with statistics and achievement tracking

title: Pause Functionality
notes: Implements game pause system with menu options and state preservation

title: Options Configuration
notes: Implements game options menu with customizable settings and persistence

notes: Implements player ship destruction sequence and game over state transition

title: Player Authentication
notes: Implements player account system with secure login and data persistence
